Storyline:

Film examines a time after the war in Lebanon, particularly since the signing of the Taif Agreement to
the martyrdom of former Lebanese Prime Minister Rafik Hariri and the Syrian withdrawal from Lebanon, through
a series of short stories, it seems at first glance they are intertwined with each other before we discover
the opposite post.

The story of these stories revolve around the Egyptian director choose to Beirut to shoot a film about repression
in the Arab world, believing the large margin of freedom, there is located is the same as victims of repression in
this city. Another story talks about revenge ... A third story discovers Beirut at night
